document.full_text: u.s. health regulators on friday approved roche holding ag's rheumatoid arthritis drug actemra for treating a rare form of juvenile arthritis.
document.title: roche gets fda nod for broader actemra use
lines_and_colors: u.s. health regulators on friday approved roche holding ag's rheumatoid arthritis drug actemra for treating a rare form of juvenile arthritis.
